execution_plan.description: Count orders updated in the last 7 days in the EU database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT COUNT(orders.id) AS s1__order_count FROM orders WHERE orders.updated_at >= now() - INTERVAL '7 days';

execution_plan.description: Count orders updated in the last 7 days in the US database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT COUNT(orders.id) AS s2__order_count FROM orders WHERE orders.updated_at >= now() - INTERVAL '7 days';
